Class ec.vcache.ClassCache

public class ClassCache
extends Object

forName(String)
Intended to be synonymous with Class.forName(name), except for performance.

forName 
 public static Class forName(String name) throws ClassNotFoundException
Intended to be synonymous with Class.forName(name), except for performance. If the static private ON variable is set to true, then this caches the class by its name. This should be redundant since Class.forName() already does this. However, there's suspicion it does this badly. For testing, or if there's no performance win, set ON to false and this becomes identical to Class.forName(), modulo the overhead of an extra call.
